data.title: Personal History Statement
data.text:
Home

Recruiting

Document Instructions

Document Completion Instructions

Careful​ly read and follow all the instructions on the Personal History Statement and Preliminary Interview Form.

A typed application is preferred. If this​​ is not possible, legibly and neatly print your application in block letters using black ink.

Do not print the docuements double sided.

Bring your completed Personal History Statement and Preliminary Interview Form with you to testing.

Answer all questions completely and in detail, or use NO or NONE. Do not use N/A.

If you need additional space for your answers, please make an additional copy of the exact page to complete the requested information and only fill in the necessary information.

Do not notarize or attach a picture. This will be performed by Dallas police personnel.

You are responsible for obtaining correct and full addresses. All addresses must be complete with zip codes.

Accurate and complete documents are mandatory in order to complete testing.

You are responsible for providing any changes and/or updates to your documents such as address, employment, and telephone changes by email.

If listing military members as references, co-workers, supervisors, roommates or spouses please provide their military email addresses as this will expedite your background investigation.

PDF Personal History Statement

PDF Preliminary Interview Form

PERSONAL HIST​ORY MUST BE RECEIVED IN PERSON. DO NOT FAX OR MAIL.

​
